quote: Despite winning the second debate in a landslide (every poll), it is hard to do well when Paul Ryan and others give zero support!
quotePlain: Despite winning the second debate in a landslide (every poll), it is hard to do well when Paul Ryan and others give zero support!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: But four national, scientific surveys all showed that not only did Trump not win by a landslide margin, he didn’t win any of the polls at all.
checks.quotePlain: But four national, scientific surveys all showed that not only did Trump not win by a landslide margin, he didn’t win any of the polls at all.

claims.title: Trump won 2nd 2016 presidental debate by a landslide in every poll
claims.negative: Trump didn't win 2nd 2016 presidental debate by a landslide in every poll
claims.negativePlain: Trump didn’t win 2nd 2016 presidental debate by a landslide in every poll
claims.truth: He didn't win in any of the polls.
claims.truthPlain: He didn’t win in any of the polls.
